title: As Israel takes steps to claim land in West Bank, U.S. stands by
summary_full: Despite Trump’s opposition to annexation, Israel has moved to expand control over the West Bank — to the condemnation of Britain and others at a U.N. Security Council meeting.
summary_public: Despite Trump’s opposition to annexation, Israel has moved to expand control over the West Bank — to the condemnation of Britain and others at a U.N. Security Council meeting.

GB.label: positive
GB.evidence: condemnation of Britain and others at a U.N. Security Council

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Israel takes steps to claim land in West Bank
